commit.message:
Rollup merge of #77570 - GuillaumeGomez:whitespace-doc-alias, r=jyn514,ollie27

Allow ascii whitespace char for doc aliases

Fixes issue from https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/76705#issuecomment-703123847

cc @lopopolo @ollie27

r? @jyn514

verification.payload:
tree 2b66a8016473bdc936f85038263328b659e905d5
parent e160e5cb80652bc2afe74cb3affbe35b74243ea9
parent 11f3476c59ee013c017e669676cfaca00a67b3f1
author Yuki Okushi <huyuumi.dev@gmail.com> 1602714747 +0900
committer GitHub <noreply@github.com> 1602714747 +0900

Rollup merge of #77570 - GuillaumeGomez:whitespace-doc-alias, r=jyn514,ollie27

Allow ascii whitespace char for doc aliases

Fixes issue from https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/76705#issuecomment-703123847

cc @lopopolo @ollie27

r? @jyn514

files.patch:
@@ -0,0 +1,19 @@
+// exact-check
+
+const QUERY = [
+    'Demon Lord',
+];
+
+const EXPECTED = [
+    {
+        'others': [
+            {
+                'path': 'doc_alias_whitespace',
+                'name': 'Struct',
+                'alias': 'Demon Lord',
+                'href': '../doc_alias_whitespace/struct.Struct.html',
+                'is_alias': true
+            },
+        ],
+    },
+];

@@ -11,6 +11,7 @@ pub struct Bar;
 #[doc(alias = "\n")] //~ ERROR
 #[doc(alias = "
 ")] //~^ ERROR
-#[doc(alias = " ")] //~ ERROR
 #[doc(alias = "\t")] //~ ERROR
+#[doc(alias = " hello")] //~ ERROR
+#[doc(alias = "hello ")] //~ ERROR
 pub struct Foo;

@@ -36,17 +36,23 @@ LL |   #[doc(alias = "
 LL | | ")]
    | |_^
 
-error: ' ' character isn't allowed in `#[doc(alias = "...")]`
+error: '\t' character isn't allowed in `#[doc(alias = "...")]`
   --> $DIR/check-doc-alias-attr.rs:14:7
    |
-LL | #[doc(alias = " ")]
-   |       ^^^^^^^^^^^
+LL | #[doc(alias = "\t")]
+   |       ^^^^^^^^^^^^
 
-error: '\t' character isn't allowed in `#[doc(alias = "...")]`
+error: `#[doc(alias = "...")]` cannot start or end with ' '
   --> $DIR/check-doc-alias-attr.rs:15:7
    |
-LL | #[doc(alias = "\t")]
-   |       ^^^^^^^^^^^^
+LL | #[doc(alias = " hello")]
+   |       ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^
+
+error: `#[doc(alias = "...")]` cannot start or end with ' '
+  --> $DIR/check-doc-alias-attr.rs:16:7
+   |
+LL | #[doc(alias = "hello ")]
+   |       ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^
 
-error: aborting due to 8 previous errors
+error: aborting due to 9 previous errors

@@ -11,6 +11,7 @@ pub struct Bar;
 #[doc(alias = "\n")] //~ ERROR
 #[doc(alias = "
 ")] //~^ ERROR
-#[doc(alias = " ")] //~ ERROR
 #[doc(alias = "\t")] //~ ERROR
+#[doc(alias = " hello")] //~ ERROR
+#[doc(alias = "hello ")] //~ ERROR
 pub struct Foo;

@@ -36,17 +36,23 @@ LL |   #[doc(alias = "
 LL | | ")]
    | |_^
 
-error: ' ' character isn't allowed in `#[doc(alias = "...")]`
+error: '\t' character isn't allowed in `#[doc(alias = "...")]`
   --> $DIR/check-doc-alias-attr.rs:14:7
    |
-LL | #[doc(alias = " ")]
-   |       ^^^^^^^^^^^
+LL | #[doc(alias = "\t")]
+   |       ^^^^^^^^^^^^
 
-error: '\t' character isn't allowed in `#[doc(alias = "...")]`
+error: `#[doc(alias = "...")]` cannot start or end with ' '
   --> $DIR/check-doc-alias-attr.rs:15:7
    |
-LL | #[doc(alias = "\t")]
-   |       ^^^^^^^^^^^^
+LL | #[doc(alias = " hello")]
+   |       ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^
+
+error: `#[doc(alias = "...")]` cannot start or end with ' '
+  --> $DIR/check-doc-alias-attr.rs:16:7
+   |
+LL | #[doc(alias = "hello ")]
+   |       ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^
 
-error: aborting due to 8 previous errors
+error: aborting due to 9 previous errors
